Section.SectionTitle: FY-91 Plans * On-line adaptive training will be implemented.
Section.Paragraph: * The signal processing will be improved by systematically evaluating the performance of a wide variety of signal processing algorithms.
* The robusmess will be improved by modeling altemate word pronunciations.

* The performance on short function words will be improved by developing techniques specifically modeling the phenomena which occur for such words. * The performance will be improved in general by detailed post-analysis of specific errors.
* The overall error rate will be reduced by a factor of two compared to the current system.
